title: Can we nerf malphite support somehow
body: Malphite is broken in bot lane at the moment.  The pick brings no counterplay to the lane.  Malphite can poke with the best of them and when he hits 6 the lane kill potential is huge with no counterplay.  I shouldn't have to flash to outplay an ult that is going to slow my attack speed down to the point of never being able to shoot an arrow.  I haven't discovered a way to beat this out unless you ezreal.  All other adc's need their attack speed to do any damage and malphite reduces it to the point of an automatic loss of lane.

replies.body:
>Malphite can poke with the best of them

Gave me a good laugh

8/10 shit post
Have you played against a malphite using comet, manaflow, and scorch????
One button from a level 3 malphite is going to chunk you for 150+ hp. Seems pretty bad
One shield from Janna Lulu Soraka, etc negates it completely and then he has nothing and just stands there like an ape

Cut the bs, i had a malphite sup, and we got hard forced out of lane by a soraka with kleptomancy because of how useless malphite was.

Long ass Q cd for a tiny bit of damage that they regen'd right back up.
No because nobody at my elo is stupid enough to do that
